amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the offset provision of H.R. 2401, which would reduce funding to the Diesel Emission Reductions Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 112-213 to strike the offset provision of H.R. 2401, which would reduce funding to the Diesel Emission Reductions Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 237 (Roll no. 739).
